definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to shoot a glance/glance/to appear in a flash

sentences.english: This is just a small glimpse into some of his accolades as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 这些只是他作为一名艺人，所获成就的小小一瞥。

sentences.english: She withered him with a scornful look .
sentences.chinese: 她轻蔑的一瞥使他感到羞惭。

sentences.english: He glanced guiltily over his shoulder.
Curious people streamed into the hospital Friday for a glimpse.
sentences.chinese: 周五那天，好奇的人们涌入医院只为匆匆一瞥。

sentences.english: A woman's glance is enough to intimidate me.
sentences.chinese: 女人的一瞥就足以使我惶恐不已。
从门扉的缝隙投来一瞥。

sentences.english: I got only a fleeting glimpse of them.
sentences.chinese: 我只惊鸿一瞥地看到他们。

sentences.english: It is surely a little pity. Beauty is always sparkled and then vanished.
sentences.chinese: 有点遗憾，美丽总是那么惊鸿一瞥。

sentences.english: Austalia may be getting a glimpse of its globally warmed future.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚也许会对全球变暖的前景投以一瞥。
他稍稍一瞥，景物尽收眼底。

sentences.english: From under the veil, he thought he saw her give him a saucy glance.
sentences.chinese: 他在想，她可能在面纱后面给了自己一个俏皮的一瞥。

sentences.english: Hundreds of enthusiasts wearing goggles catch a glimpse of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 数百位热情人士戴著护目镜捕捉日食现象的惊鸿一瞥。

sentences.english: But he’d hardly glanced at it.
sentences.chinese: 但他这一瞥几乎什么都没看到。

sentences.english: Ten thousand saw I at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 我只一瞥，千朵万朵，争奇斗妍。

sentences.english: Dany gave her wild children one last lingering look.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮给了她狂野的孩子们最后一瞥。

sentences.english: McFerrin said bystanders converged on the scene trying to get a glimpse of the actor.
sentences.chinese: 麦克菲林说，旁观者融合在现场试图获得一瞥演员。

definition: (out of) the corner of one's eyes/peripheral vision/residual light/light of the setting sun
one instant/very short time/the twinkle of an eye
to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to shoot a glance/glance/to appear in a flash
